body.name: Baby Stroller Fan, Mini Portable Fan USB Rechargeable Desk Fan Adjustable 3 Speeds, Personal Fan 360° Rotate Flexible Tripod Clip On for Car Seat, Crib, Bedroom, Travel
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 5 hrs 27 mins
features: Upgraded Flexible Tripod: TAECCL baby stroller fan has an upgraded tripod which is made of high quality metal and Silicone cover, instead of the old plastic and sponge surface. The tripod is flexible, you can bent any angle you want.

Strong Wind & Quiet: This mini fan has 3 speed setting, one-button operation for switching different wind speeds. The low noise motor is suitable for your quiet office or reading, and suitable for your baby to sleep comfortably.

Powerful, Rechargeable Battery: The TAECCL portable stroller fan has a built-in 1800 mAh rechargeable battery, 2-8 hours working time depend on different speeds, provides long-lasting breeze, ensuring your baby stays cool for an extended period. Charging by USB, 2 hours can be fully charged.

Conveniently Portable: Compact yet powerful, this fan for stroller with 5.5 inches flexible tripod, is convenient to carry around and provides excellent airflow in all situations - be it a sunny day in the park or a long road trip in your car! The USB fan is suitable for strollers, treadmills, tents, desks, car seats.

Versatile Application: While primarily designed for strollers and car seats, this portable fan for the stroller also comes in handy in a range of other contexts - at the beach, during camping trips, or even at home!
body.description: The TAECCL Stroller Fan is a versatile device designed for your baby's comfort on sunny days and long drives. This baby fan has been crafted with precise attention to detail, offering a safe, efficient, and portable solution to keep your child cool and comfortable at all times.With its adjustable grip, it fits a variety of stroller and car seat models, ensuring a breezy experience wherever you are. The fan boasts a powerful, rechargeable battery, guaranteeing that the airflow remains consistent for a long duration.Though compact, the TAECCL stroller fan never compromises on power, providing ample airflow in every situation. While the primary use is in strollers and car seats, its versatility also makes it a great companion for other outdoor occasions.Trust in TAECCL for the best baby stroller and car seat fan needs, and ensure a cool, comfortable journey for your baby, wherever you go! Make your outings breeze-perfect with the TAECCL Stroller Fan today!Baby-friendly design: Fan cover specifically designed to protect little inquisitive fingers.TAECCL Mini Stroller Fan will be good partner for you ①Creative flexible tripod design, free your hands! ②Strong Wind & quiet ③Adjustable 3 speeds ④Safe and durable ⑤Rechargeable stroller fan ⑥Portable fan The fan for stroller brings cool and worry-free summer to your baby。

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprisingly Cool Little Fan
reviews.reviewText: I purchased a similar type fan a couple years ago to use at DJ events that I worked. It had the same flexible legs and could attach to various surfaces but it was not very powerful and the battery life seemed inconsistent. I'm happy to say that this one does not have any of those drawbacks. The flexible legs are quite convenient for attaching to tables, chairs, etc., or just for shaping into a stand that can sit on a tabletop. The small profile of the fan head initially concerned me that it would provide very much coverage, but it actually works really well, oscillating or not. The speed settings are nice, and the battery life has been great. It also works plugged in for really long periods of use, though I haven't needed to run it like that yet. It's been solid for the multiple hour periods I've needed it thus far. Nice product for a nice price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this item for my Disney/Universal studios vacation. It was very hot and this device was a lifesaver! The battery lasted all day and the fan was pretty strong. I love that it has a setting that allows it to move back and forth. This was an excellent purchase!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hot Flash Relief!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I bought this fan for my hot flashes. Works like a charm. It has 4 settings and moves quite a bit of air. The base is adjustable and I can either hold it or bend it so that it sits on my end table blowing on me. No idea why I waited so long to make this purchase! If you carry a big enough purse, it will fit. And the battery uses very little juice so it would go for hours without needing a charge. Such a small investment for a big return in my opinion. TOTALLY WORTH IT!! My husband even uses it to cool off after working outside in this heat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Quirky little fan
reviews.reviewText: This quirky little fan is a nice help on the hotter days of summer to provide my son with a much needed cool breeze. It rotates gently back and forth, or stays idle by the touch of a button. The breeze is not super strong though, so he’s usually still pretty hot and sweaty while using it. This product may be better suited for the younger babies, but I’m still happy with it because it does provide some relief for him. Also the flexible legs make the fan easy to hook on to things just about anywhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the beach & pool
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to use at the beach and pool. I typically do not get in the water until it’s warmed up some, but I still need to cool off when it’s hot. This is perfect. It is easy to adjust and it stays in place. Nice long charge and has a sufficient enough breeze to cool me off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Convenient- buy it
reviews.reviewText: This little fan has some power behind it. Three different fan speeds which was surprising for this little thing. We recently changed our daughters bed to a loft bed and realized too late that her ceiling fan was way too close when she was climbing off her ladder. We got this for bedtime and it’s totally worth it. The first night we got it I thought it died, but it actually just shuts off after a while which was a plus.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good quality, works great, good price I use it in the stroller for the dogs. I like it cause it's rechargable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This holds securely, bladeless so my child doesn't try and stick their finger in it, and the different rotations are super useful for carseat verse stroller. I highly recommend. I have one on the car seat plugged into the USB charger so I don't have to forget about charging it in between car rides.
